item.title: Solving CaptureTheEther - Part 5 of 5 - Miscellaneous
item.description: This last category of challenges is a mix of various types of vulnerabilities that don't really fit into any of the other categories.

item.title: Solving CaptureTheEther - Part 2 of 5 - Lotteries
item.description: This is the second post of a total of five, for the CaptureTheEther CTF writeups. This time, the focus will be on the Lotteries category of challenges. Most levels here will require the player to code and deploy new contracts to the network, and interact with them.
